14 class CameraFrame {
15 public:
25  CameraFrame(RJ::Time t_capture, int camera_id,
26  std::vector<CameraBall> camera_balls,
27  std::vector<CameraRobot> camera_robots_yellow,
28  std::vector<CameraRobot> camera_robots_blue)
29  : t_capture(t_capture),
30  camera_id(camera_id),
31  camera_balls(std::move(camera_balls)),

34 
39  CameraFrame(const DetectionFrameMsg& msg,
40  const rj_geometry::TransformMatrix& world_to_team,
41  double team_angle)
42  : t_capture{rj_convert::convert_from_ros(msg.t_capture)},
43  camera_id{static_cast<int>(msg.camera_id)},
44  camera_balls{},
45  camera_robots_yellow{},
46  camera_robots_blue{} {
47  for (const DetectionBallMsg& ball_msg : msg.balls) {
48  camera_balls.emplace_back(t_capture, ball_msg, world_to_team);
49  }
50 
51  for (const DetectionRobotMsg& robot_msg : msg.robots_blue) {
52  camera_robots_blue.emplace_back(t_capture, robot_msg, world_to_team,
53  team_angle);
54  }
55  for (const DetectionRobotMsg& robot_msg : msg.robots_yellow) {
56  camera_robots_yellow.emplace_back(t_capture, robot_msg, world_to_team,
57  team_angle);
58  }
59  }
60 
61  RJ::Time t_capture;
62  int camera_id;
63  std::vector<CameraBall> camera_balls;
64  std::vector<CameraRobot> camera_robots_yellow;
65  std::vector<CameraRobot> camera_robots_blue;
66 };
67 } // namespace vision_filter
